idea:
Renovate India is a Social Enterprise working towards capacity building of Grassroot NGOs and CBOs since 2015. We are connected with around 3K + NGOs across Maharashtra State of India and have been consulting towards sustainability, documentation, and project implementations with NGOs. Throughout our journey of 5 years, while working with grassroot NGOs, we found out the existence of huge gap between Funding opportunities from entities like CSR eligible companies and potential NGOs within Social Sector. This gap led to delayed response time, lesser impact on beneficiaries and no medium to facilitate requirement. GlocalBodh (product by Renovate India) envisions to Enable the Ecosystem by improving efficiency and effectiveness of the Grassroots NGOs & CBO and creating a support system for NGOs & CBO to achieve their goals. GlocalBodh is India's first Mobile App for Social Sector Updates. Through GlocalBodh, we bridge the gap between CSR entities and Beneficiary NGOs.

*GlocalBodh's NGO Sourcing Model:

-> CSR professionals post their project requirement on GlocalBodh App

-> We broadcast the requirement to NGOs connected and receive their applications

-> CSR Shortlist applications which suit their requirement > We charge CSR on Per Lead Basis

*GlocalBodh's Event Sourcing Model:

-> Clients post their event (Workshop/Training/Competition/Summits etc.) on GlocalBodh App

-> GlocalBodh broadcasts the requirement through GlocalBodh app

-> GlocalBodh receives applications/registrations from beneficiaries

-> We charge entities on Per Conversion Basis.

GlocalBodh Facilitation Model: It also provides facilitation/mobilisation service for any requirement within Social Sector with a result driven approach through our connections with NGOs."
name: GlocalBodh

idea:
Genesis Pharma offers a wide range of consulting services with the necessary tools and expertise to help grow your business. We partner with our clients from start to finish, focusing on their needs while producing new ideas, developing effective strategies and designing high quality and scalable solutions. Contact us to learn more.

 

Our expertise include New Product Development, Research and Analytical services, Clinical, Regulatory services, Query Management for USFDA, UK MHRA, TGA Australia, MCC South Africa, Asia ,Africa and Indian FDA.
name: Genesis Pharmaceuticals
